comparison_metadata.v6_prompt: Cultural Enhanced with Asian e-commerce awareness

test_cases.title: 大國藥妝香港開店定價無優勢！學識日本轉運平價入手化妝品、日用品等必買推介
test_cases.improvement: V6 fixes V5 failure - captures compound Asian brand

test_cases.title: 【2025年最新】日本一番賞Online手把手教學！用超親民價格獲得高質官方動漫周邊
test_cases.improvement: V6 preserves cultural term (ichiban-kuji) vs V5's generic anime-merchandise

test_cases.title: 【日本JK制服品牌 Lucy Pop】人氣日系校園穿搭登陸香港
test_cases.improvement: V6 preserves cultural fashion term (jk-uniform) and better content type

test_cases.title: DR.WU台灣買最平！杏仁酸/A醇/玻尿酸保濕等明星產品買一送一，內附網購集運教學
test_cases.improvement: Both versions handle established brands well, V6 improves content type detection

test_cases.title: 日本樂天時尚特價1折怎麼買？NB、BEAMS等男女、童裝優惠合集及集運教學
test_cases.improvement: V6 captures discount context better, maintains multi-brand handling

key_improvements.description: V6 fixes V5's complete failure on complex compound brands
key_improvements.example: 大國藥妝 → daikoku-drugstore (V5 failed entirely)

key_improvements.description: V6 preserves important cultural terms instead of generic substitutions
V6 handles brand + cultural term combinations better
V6 better captures discount, proxy, shipping contexts
key_improvements.example: 特價1折 → discount-guide, 集運 → shipping

recommendations.deployment: V6 ready for immediate production deployment
recommendations.confidence: High - addresses all known V5 limitations
recommendations.monitoring: Monitor performance on Western brand content (some timeout issues observed)
future_improvements: Enhanced multi-brand handling in single titles
Improved timeout handling for complex titles
